snippet: Boisterous galleries could not get enough of a middle-aged John Daly playing like the old John Daly, as he shot a 68 in the first round of the P.G.A. Championship.
abstract: Boisterous galleries could not get enough of a middle-aged John Daly playing like the old John Daly, as he shot a 68 in the first round of the PGA Championship.
lead_paragraph: Boisterous galleries could not get enough of a middle-aged John Daly playing like the old John Daly, as he shot a 68 in the first round of the P.G.A. Championship.

headline.seo: Daly, Still a Fan Favorite, in the Hunt in the P.G.A.
headline.main: Daly, Still Fan Favorite, Is in Hunt in the P.G.A.
